amendment.description: An amendment to require the Office for State and Local Government Coordination and Preparedness to ensure that States disburse grant funds obligated to a local government by not later than 15 days after receipt of an invoice for an authorized outlay by the local government.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Sanchez, Loretta amendment was withdrawn.
